card_text: Target 1 "Amazement" monster you control or 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; equip this card to it. You can activate the following effect, based on which player controls the equipped monster;$N●You: Target 1 Spell/Trap your opponent controls; send both it and this card to the GY.$N●Your opponent: Add 1 "Amazement" monster from your Deck to your hand, and if you do, send this card to the GY.$NYou can only use this effect of "Amaze Attraction Cyclo-Coaster" once per turn.
